CustomField.formula: CASE ( Reason__c , 'Customer Account Transfer','K02', 'Refund credit balance','K01', 'Internal Post transfer','K03', 'Credit2','K04', 'Data Entry Error','K05', 'Duplicate Billing','K06', 'Incorrect Bill','K07', 'Contract Expired - Charged Full Rate','K08', 'Incorrect Pricing Profile Applied','K09', 'Incorrect Product Data Provided','K10', 'Un-manifested Fee Refund','K11', 'Delivery Error','K12', 'Late Delivery Claim','K13', 'Manifest Not Posted','K14', 'No Proof Of Delivery','K15', 'Customer Claim Met','K16', 'Fee Refund Applied','K18', 'Minimum Value - Shortfall Fee','K19', 'Incorrect Cubic Data','K23', 'Incorrect Cubic Data(Customer)','K23', 'Incorrect Weight','K21', 'Product Return','K22', 'Early Payment Rebate','K17', 'Rebate','K20', 'Write Off','K24', 'Operator Error','A28', 'BML - Operator Error','BM1', 'BML - Mailing Statement','BM2', 'BML - Overcharged','BM3', 'BML - Undercharged','BM4', 'BML - Wrong Account','BM5', 'BML - Duplicate Mail','BM6', 'CCM -Sales Director','K16', 'eLMS Mailing Stateme','MS1', 'International Linehaul Surcharge','K18', 'Incorrect Cubic Data(Operations)','K10', 'Peak Fee','K26', 'Over Maximum Limits Fee','K27', 'Manifest Correction Fee','K28', 'Force Majeure Fee','K29', ' ')
CustomField.label: SAP Reason Code
